---
title: Browser Pools
description: Managed pools of browser instances for high-throughput automation
---

Browser Pools provide managed, pre-warmed browser instances that are ready to use instantly. Instead of creating new browser sessions on demand, pools maintain a set of active browsers that can be allocated to your automation tasks immediately.

## Key Benefits

- **Instant session availability** - No cold start delays
- **Automatic scaling** - Pools grow and shrink based on demand
- **Resource optimization** - Efficient browser lifecycle management
- **High throughput** - Handle thousands of concurrent automations

<Info>
  **Enterprise Feature**

  Browser Pools are available exclusively for enterprise customers. Contact [andrea@notte.cc](mailto:andrea@notte.cc) to learn more about enterprise plans and custom deployment options.
</Info>
